post:
So! Whats going on I hear you cry? Who are these people?

Hello! We are the wonderful people from DialAServer.

At DialAServer we take serious pride in our customers. This is why we have a fully operational 24/7 support team that allow's you to speak to one of the members of the support team regarding ANY issue.

DialAServer has been running successfully for over 5 months. We work alongside 4 different companies worldwide!
Our main brand is DialANetwork Limited, we have been around a good year or more, we plan to stay!

Our servers utilize at least 8GB of DDR3 Ram, 2 x 500GB/1TB disks in RAID 1 and of course Quad cores or higher
Our uptime has been great for the last year or so, with the odd reboot, but generally a great service for all!

Give the promotion code "DSRVFEB" to get 20% recurring discount on any order!

Here is a quick list of what we offer at DialAServer:

Here are a few frequently asked questions!

Uptime
We have a pretty solid uptime, we have had two or three outages in the last 6 months, however each lasted less than 3 minutes.

Oversold?
Well from the price and plans, I am sure you can see they are not oversold. We hold a no overselling policy, quality is key! We want our customers to stay not run!

Company
DialAServer Limited is a UK based private Limited Company, operated by DialANetwork Limited, which has been around for the past 15 months, we plan to stay.

Locations
We offer 4 locations, however the current stock is DE, we also have some USA stock, so do ask if you want another location.

Expensive?
We think our prices are well chosen, friendly and fairly low priced, since they include management as well.

Setup?
All servers are deployed instant, however some errors may happen from time to time, so submit a ticket if this isn't the case.

We look forward to seeing you.


http://www.dialaserver.co.uk :agree:
